objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#F5F5F5'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#2E5CB8'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#1A4091'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#FFB30F'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#FF9500'/><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='270' cy='270' r='200' fill='#4B7FE8'/><circle cx='810' cy='810' r='200' fill='#FFD700'/></g><g transform='translate(50, 50)'><path d='M0,0 L100,100 M25,0 L125,100 M50,0 L150,100' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/></g><g transform='translate(750, 750)'><path d='M0,0 L100,100 M25,0 L125,100 M50,0 L150,100' stroke='white' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3'/></g><g opacity='0.15'><path d='M540,0 L540,1080' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0,540 L1080,540' stroke='white' stroke-width='2'/></g><g transform='translate(400, 480)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/></g><g transform='translate(920, 100)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='5' fill='white' opacity='0.7'/></g><g transform='translate(100, 900)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='7' fill='#1A4091' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='25' cy='0' r='7' fill='#1A4091' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='50' cy='0' r='7' fill='#1A4091' opacity='0.5'/></g><g transform='translate(820, 620)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='7' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='25' cy='0' r='7' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='50' cy='0' r='7' fill='#FFD700' opacity='0.5'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• High-contrast Display
• Bluetooth Connectivity
• Built-in Navigation
• Long-lasting Battery

product_details.name: Advanced GPS Cycling Computer - Smart Navigation Device with Russian Interface
product_details.description:
• High-contrast monochrome display for excellent visibility in all conditions
• Bluetooth connectivity for seamless smartphone integration
• Multiple activity tracking modes including cycling and training
• Built-in navigation system with route guidance
• Customizable interface with easy-to-use menu system
• Activity history and performance tracking
• Long-lasting battery with battery level indicator
• Compact and lightweight design for portable use
• Weather-resistant construction for outdoor activities
• Multiple language support including Russian interface
• Clear and intuitive icon-based menu system
• Compatible with various training and fitness apps

banner_details:
This banner design is a promotional layout for a cycling GPS computer. It is divided into four vibrant quadrants with a clean, grid-based arrangement. The top-left quadrant uses a bold title (`heading`) and promotional captions (`tagline`, `subheading`, `description`) in uppercase white and yellow text over a blue background, emphasizing urgency and exclusivity. Adjacent is a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) on a darker blue backdrop. The lower-left quadrant features a feature list (`features`) in readable bullet points on yellow and orange. The bottom-right highlights the price (`price`) in large white text and includes a call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`). Decorative circular and linear patterns enhance modernity and depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Royal Blue: #2E5CB8
- Navy Blue: #1A4091
- Golden Yellow: #FFD700
- Orange: #FF9500
- Light Gray/White: #FFFFFF
- Dark Gray Text: #333333
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek handheld device with a modern, minimalist interface. The dominant colors include deep black (#000000) for the screen bezel, light lavender (#E3E6F0) for the interface background, and muted interface icon shades like maroon (#7A445F), slate blue (#5A6C9B), and teal gray (#6E8A87). These tones blend subtly, creating visual cohesion while allowing icons to stand out strategically. The use of soft gradients and semi-transparent overlays keeps design non-obtrusive yet intuitive. For a compelling banner, a palette using black (#000000), lavender (#E3E6F0), maroon (#7A445F), and slate blue (#5A6C9B) would create consistency and highlight product elegance and functionality.
